item.title: Database migrations in Golang.
item.description: During the development of an app, it’s very common to do changes in the database schema, for a new feature you need to add a new table, add a new column to an existing table, alter the type of existing column or delete a column. When you work alone you could do it manually, run the queries to alter the database schemas manually. What happens when your team is not a one-person team?
